title: How can i get pixel 4a as a review unit for my channel?
content:
Hi, 
I need google pixel 4a as a review unit for my site. I saw in some questions that you do not give review units but how come the YouTube channel "Singh In USA" is getting free review units from google . So is there any requirements that channel with this much subscribers will only get google review units . Please clarify my doubt. 

Regards.
